testcase.classname: Customer creation flow by PM and approval by BAM
testcase.name: Customer creation by PM and Approval by BAM :[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed When I go to Customer Page..................................................passed Then I create an Customer...................................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a BAM......................................passed And I approve the customer..................................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed When I go to Customer Page..................................................passed And I verify that the customer is approved..................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
